about.title: Restoration Master
about.name: Yan Davydov
about.aboutme: For more than 4 years, I have been professionally engaged in the restoration of parquet flooring and wooden decorative elements in Moscow and the Moscow region. Only professional chemistry such as Ciranova, Bona, Konig, Berger is used during work. The best equipment from Lagler: Hummel, Trio, Flip is used.

advantages.card1_2: In case of local defects of the floor, it is possible to restore the parquet. During the restoration, it is possible to replace the board, remove chips, cracks, dents, and stains. The application of a protective coating extends the service life of the parquet.
advantages.card2_2: To create a beautiful floor pattern, we carry out work on the parquet, including sanding the parquet, filling in chips, cracks and deep scratches, and in some cases, replacing boards. After that, the parquet is coated with oil or varnish.

compare.novideo: Your browser does not support HTML5 video

tooltips.phone: Every day from 9:00 to 21:00 Moscow time
